text: Sascha Pohflepp (January 30, 1978 – June 17, 2019) was a German artist, designer, and writer. He was born in Cologne. His works focused on the role of technology to influence the environment, often in working with artists and scientists. His best known works were Growth Assembly (2009, with Alexandra Daisy Ginsberg, illustrations by Sion Ap Tomos); Spacewalk (2017); Deep Unlearning (I) (2018, with Chris Woebken); and Those Who (2019). His death was announced on 25 June 2019.Sascha Pohflepp (1978–2019) He was 41 years old. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Unexplained deaths Category:German designers Category:Writers from Cologne
